channel.title: anthem on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in anthem on Rusland 1

item.title: Muslim Magomajev and Big Children's Choir – New Day
item.description: Blue and Red Lyrics (see here) by Nikolai Dobronravov (= Николай Добронравов, 1928). Music by Aleksandra Pakhmutova (= Александра Пахмутова, 1929). Also see Наша Родина – революция (rline.tv, 2017). Новый день берёт своё начало, The new day takes its start На бескрайних улицах Москвы.

item.title: Oleg Gazmanov – Forward Russia (Вперёд, Россия!)
item.description: Hackers According to the description of Вперёд, Россия! (Forward Russia), the clip о Величии России, about the greatness of Russia, was removed by hackers. Gazmanov’s website was also hacked. Значит, он кого-то настолько сильно задел, meaning it must have hit someone hard.

item.title: Russian National Anthem
item.description: The text begins, in both of the first two sentences, simply with Россия (Russia). Our sacred might (священная наша держава), our beloved country (любимая наша страна). No foreign blood or king from afar. Putin The current National Anthem of the Russian Federation was (re)established in 2000 by Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Слот – Russian Soul
item.description: Defend In addition to this неофициальный клип (unofficial clip), there is also a cartoon version, a live version (2016), and as the icing on the cake (literally), a Ролик о России ( clip about Russia) – with planes and tanks, bears and a tiger, soldiers, and much more.
